mapper.insert:
insert into sub_order (id, order_id, status, total_price, address, saler_id, commodity_id, commodity_name, price, num) values
( #{item.subOrderId}, #{item.orderId}, #{item.status}, #{item.totalPrice}, #{item.address}, #{item.salerId}, #{item.commodityId}, #{item.commodityName}, #{item.price}, #{item.num} )
